title: Cheakamus River - Balls To The Wall
whats_it_like: Extension of the Upper Cheak - great class IV-IV+ river running, and a bonus waterfall.  Some wood.
scouting_portaging: Scouting is ok.  Difficult to portage in spots, if you're forced to.  Falls is easy to walk.

time.original: 2-3 hours for a relaxed first trip.

when_to_go: All season, very pushy at high flows.  Reasonable minimum is 2.1.
